text:
* The inaugural edition of the tournament will feature six teams, with each team announcing nine U.S.-based players and six overseas signings.
* Aaron Finch, the former Australian captain, will captain the San Francisco Unicorns, joined by teammates Marcus Stoinis, Brody Couch, and Liam Plunkett.
* Quinton de Kock, the former South African captain, will play for the Seattle Orcas, alongside Mitchell Marsh.
* Other overseas signings include Wanindu Hasaranga and Anrich Nortje for the DC Freedom.
* Monank Patel and Steven Taylor were picked up by MI New York, while Nitish Kumar went to the Los Angeles Knight Riders.
* More overseas signings will be announced in the coming weeks.

**Match Details**

* Teams: Seattle Orcas vs San Francisco Unicorns
* Date & Time: Monday, July 15, 2024 (various times depending on region)
* Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville, North Carolina, United States
* Weather: 36°C (96.8°F) with clear, sunny skies

**Team Form**

* Seattle Orcas: Bottom of the table, recently lost to Washington Freedom, last three matches: LWLLW
* San Francisco Unicorns: Shaky start to the season, recently lost to Texas Super Kings, last three matches: ALWLL

**Betting Analysis**

* Seattle Orcas: Heinrich Klaasen is a good bet to score 30+, Nandre Burger could be the team's top bowler
* San Francisco Unicorns: Matthew Short is a key batter, Hassan Khan could take two or more wickets

**Expert Prediction**

* The match could be a high-scoring one, with the Unicorns' top order potentially outscoring the Orcas.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings won by 15 runs.

**Score:** Texas Super Kings 176/6 (20 overs), MI New York 161/7 (20 overs).

**Top Performers:**

* Faf du Plessis (TSK): 61 runs in 38 balls
* Monank Patel (MINY): 61 runs
* Rashid Khan (MINY): 50 runs and 1/17 in bowling
* Marcus Stoinis (TSK): Key bowling performance, including early wickets
* Dwayne Bravo (TSK): Crucial 19th over, conceding only 8 runs to seal the win

**Match Summary:** Texas Super Kings posted 176/6, thanks to Faf du Plessis' quickfire fifty and Devon Conway's support. MI New York faced early setbacks, losing five wickets inside 11 overs. However, Rashid Khan and Monank Patel's 97-run stand revived their hopes. Despite a late scare, Texas Super Kings held on to win by 15 runs.

**Match Schedule:**

* San Francisco Unicorns vs Seattle Orcas - Major League Cricket
	+ Start Time: 3:10 PM ET, 3:30 PM ET (two separate matches)
	+ TV Channels: Willow TV, NBC Sports Networks, ROOT SPORTS Northwest
	+ Live Stream: Available on Fubo with the International Sports Plus package

**Player Updates:**

* Pat Cummins, Australian fast bowler, will join the San Francisco Unicorns midway through the MLC season, having signed a four-year deal with the franchise.
* Ottneil Baartman, South African fast bowler, will replace Gerald Coetzee (injured) at Texas Super Kings.
* Lungi Ngidi, South African fast bowler, will replace Wayne Parnell (withdrew) at Seattle Orcas.
* Sherfane Rutherford, West Indian allrounder, will miss the rest of the MLC due to a family bereavement and will depart from San Francisco Unicorns.

**Team Standings:**

* San Francisco Unicorns have won only one of their three games so far this season.

**Notable Player Statistics:**

* Pat Cummins has played 151 T20s, picking up 172 wickets at an average of 26.66 and an economy rate of 8.11.
* Ottneil Baartman has 107 wickets from 76 T20s and is known for his variations and death-bowling ability.

* Pat Cummins, Australian fast bowler, will join the San Francisco Unicorns midway through the ongoing MLC season, after inking a four-year deal with the franchise.
* The San Francisco Unicorns have had a poor start to the season, with only one win in three games, and are eagerly awaiting Cummins' arrival.
* Cummins' arrival coincides with the departure of Sherfane Rutherford, who will miss the remainder of the MLC due to a family bereavement.
* Other MLC news includes Ottneil Baartman replacing Gerald Coetzee, who is injured, at Texas Super Kings, and Lungi Ngidi replacing Wayne Parnell, who withdrew from Seattle Orcas' squad.
* Baartman and Ngidi bring a wealth of experience to their respective teams, with 107 wickets in 76 T20 games and a strong track record in death bowling.

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom won by 8 wickets against Los Angeles Knight Riders.

**Match Details:**

* Date: July 14, 2024
* Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville
* Washington Freedom's score: 130/2 (16 overs)
* Los Angeles Knight Riders' score: 129/10 (18.4 overs)

**Key Performances:**

* Saurabh Netravalkar (Washington Freedom): 4/35 with the ball
* Glen Maxwell (Washington Freedom): 3/15 with the ball
* Travis Head (Washington Freedom): 54 runs off 27 balls
* Steven Smith (Washington Freedom): 42* runs

**Match Summary:** Washington Freedom dominated the match, restricting Los Angeles Knight Riders to 129/10 with impressive bowling performances from Saurabh Netravalkar and Glen Maxwell. In response, Travis Head's aggressive knock and Steven Smith's composed innings helped Washington Freedom chase down the target with ease, winning by 8 wickets.

* The Los Angeles Knight Riders will face Washington Freedom in their next MLC 2024 match at the Church Street Park, Morrisville.
* The match is scheduled to start at 01:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Time).
* Although Sony Sports Network has the official broadcast rights, the match will not be telecast on their TV channel due to other commitments.
* However, cricket fans in India can watch the match for free through live streaming on the JioCinema app and website.
* The article also mentions that the previous match between Texas Super Kings and Washington Freedom was washed out, despite Faf du Plessis scoring a century.

* The Washington Freedom defeated the Los Angeles Knight Riders in a convincing match, continuing their unbeaten streak in the league.
* The Knight Riders were bowled out for a low total of 129, with only Badar showing resistance, due to poor batting and aggressive approach on a challenging wicket.
* The Freedom's bowlers, including Glenn Maxwell, performed well to restrict the Knight Riders' score.
* In response, the Freedom's openers provided a solid start, and despite a few wickets falling, Steven Smith and Andries Gous guided their team to a comfortable win.
* Glenn Maxwell was named the Player of the Match for his impressive bowling performance, while Travis Head also played a crucial role in the Freedom's victory.
* The next match in the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament will be between the Texas Super Kings and MI New York, starting at 6 am IST (12.30 am GMT).

**Match Details**: Washington Freedom (WAS) will face Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAS) in Match 11 of MLC 2024 at Church Street Park in Morrisville on July 15.

**Team Standings**: Washington Freedom currently leads the points table with 2 wins in 3 games and a positive net run-rate (NRR) of 0.675. Los Angeles Knight Riders are in 4th position with 1 win in 4 games and a negative NRR of 0.542.

**Pitch Report**: The pitch at Church Street Park is conducive to high run totals, with short boundaries and consistent bounce, making it ideal for batting. Fast bowlers will need to have control over their line and length to be successful.

**Probable Playing 11**: The article lists the probable playing 11 for both teams, with Washington Freedom led by Steven Smith and Los Angeles Knight Riders led by Sunil Narine.

**Probable Top Performers**: Jason Roy is predicted to be the best batter in the match, while Saurabh Netravalkar is expected to be the best bowler.

**Match Prediction**: The article predicts that the team that wins the toss and chooses to bowl first will win the match, with two possible scenarios presented based on the toss outcome.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings (TSK) defeated MI New York (MINY) by 15 runs in their MLC 2024 fixture at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Score:** TSK scored 176/6, while MINY managed 161 in response.

**Key Performances:**

* Faf du Plessis (TSK) scored 61 in 38 balls, setting a strong foundation for his team.
* Rashid Khan (MINY) took 1/17 and scored 50, leading a spirited fightback for his team.
* Monank Patel (MINY) scored 61, partnering with Rashid Khan for a 97-run stand for the 6th wicket.
* Marcus Stoinis (TSK) took three crucial wickets, including Nicholas Pooran and Kieron Pollard, and scored some powerful shots towards the end.

**Points Table:** With this win, TSK jumped to the second spot in the points table with 6 points in 5 games, having won two games, lost one, and had one game abandoned.

* The Washington Freedom defeated the Los Angeles Knight Riders by 8 wickets in a match of the 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket at Church Street Park, Morrisville on Sunday.
* The Washington Freedom's Saurabh Netravalkar took 4 wickets for 35 runs and Glen Maxwell took 3 wickets for 15 runs to restrict the Los Angeles Knight Riders to 129/10.
* Travis Head scored 54 runs and Steven Smith scored 42* to help the Washington Freedom chase down the target with 4 overs to spare.
* This is the Washington Freedom's third consecutive victory in the tournament.

**Match Results:**

* Washington Freedom defeated Los Angeles Knight Riders by 8 wickets, with Travis Head scoring 54 runs and Steve Smith scoring 42 runs.
* Texas Super Kings defeated MI New York by 15 runs, with Faf du Plessis scoring 61 runs and Devon Conway scoring 40 runs.

**Updated Points Table:**

* Washington Freedom: 7 points, NRR: 1.051
* Texas Super Kings: 6 points, NRR: 1.093
* MI New York: 3 points, NRR: 0.579
* San Francisco Unicorns: 3 points, NRR: -0.631
* Los Angeles Knight Riders: 3 points, NRR: -0.842
* Seattle Orcas: 2 points, NRR: -1.007

**Most Runs:**

* Faf du Plessis: 148 runs, Avg: 49.33, Sr: 166.29
* Steven Smith: 126 runs, Avg: 126.00, Sr: 140.00
* Devon Conway: 124 runs, Avg: 62.00, Sr: 147.62
* Jason Roy: 109 runs, Avg: 27.25, Sr: 119.78
* Ryan Rickelton: 107 runs, Avg: 107.00, Sr: 138.96

**Most Wickets:** (Not specified in the article)

* Australian captain Pat Cummins is set to join the San Francisco Unicorns for the 2024 MLC season, signing a four-year deal with the team.
* Cummins' addition to the Unicorns comes as a significant boost, given the team's struggling performance with only one win in three matches.
* Cummins' recent form has been exceptional, including back-to-back hat-tricks in the T20 World Cup 2024, and he brings a strong T20 record of 172 wickets in 151 matches.
* The Australian skipper's arrival coincides with the departure of West Indies all-rounder Sherfane Rutherford, who is unable to continue in the MLC due to a family bereavement.
* Other MLC teams have also made changes to their squads, with Ottneil Baartman replacing Gerald Coetzee (injury) at Texas Super Kings and Lungi Ngidi coming in for Wayne Parnell (player withdrawal) at Seattle Orcas.

**Match Preview**

Match 13 of MLC 2024 will be played between Seattle Orcas (SEA) and San Francisco Unicorns (SF) on July 16 at Church Street Park in Morrisville. Seattle Orcas are currently at the bottom of the points table with one win in three games and a negative Net Run Rate of 1.007, while San Francisco Unicorns hold the fourth position with one win in three matches and a negative NRR of 0.631.

**Team Performance**

Seattle Orcas are coming off a five-wicket defeat against table-toppers Washington Freedom and are looking to bounce back. San Francisco Unicorns won their first game, lost their second game to Texas Super Kings, and had their last game washed out, making them desperate for a victory.

**Pitch Report**

The Morrisville pitch is expected to retain its nature throughout the 20-over match, with a slower pace and uneven bounce in the second innings, giving bowlers an advantage. Teams may opt to set reasonable targets instead of pushing for extremely high scores.

**Head-to-Head Record and Probable Playing 11**

The head-to-head record is not mentioned in the article. The probable playing 11 for both teams are listed, with players like Ryan Rickelton, Quinton de Kock, and Heinrich Klaasen for Seattle Orcas, and Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, and Corey Anderson for San Francisco Unicorns.

**Probable Top Performers**

Ryan Rickelton is predicted to be the best batter in the match, having scored an unbeaten century in his previous game against Washington Freedom. Cameron Gannon is predicted to be the best bowler, having scalped four wickets in three games with his pace and swing.

**Match Summary:** Washington Freedom defeated Los Angeles Knight Riders by 8 wickets in a match played at Church Street Park in Morrisville on July 15.

**Notable Performances:**

* Steve Smith (Washington Freedom) scored an unbeaten 42 off 36 balls, including 2 sixes and 2 boundaries, to lead his team to victory.
* Travis Head (Washington Freedom) scored 54 off 32 deliveries, including 6 sixes and 2 boundaries, to make a significant contribution to the chase.
* Steve Smith hit a colossal 94-meter six off Andre Russell's delivery in the fourth over of the Freedom innings.

**Team Performance:**

* Los Angeles Knight Riders were bowled out for 129 in 18.4 overs, with Saif Badar top-scoring with 35 off 28 balls.
* Washington Freedom's bowlers excelled, with Saurabh Netravalkar taking 4/35, Glenn Maxwell taking 3 wickets, and Lockie Ferguson taking 2 wickets.

**Points Table:**

* Washington Freedom solidified their top position in the MLC 2024 points table with 3 wins from 4 games.
* Los Angeles Knight Riders are struggling, positioned fifth in the six-team tournament with only 1 win from their first 5 games.

Ryan Rickelton and Quinton De Kock are the top batters for Seattle Orcas, while Matthew Short is the top batter for San Francisco Unicorns. Cameron Gannon and Harmeet Singh are the top bowlers for Seattle Orcas, and Haris Rauf is the top bowler for San Francisco Unicorns. 

The prediction for the match is that Seattle Orcas will win, with a predicted score of 160-180 runs if they bat first and 120-140 runs if San Francisco Unicorns bat first.

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom defeated Los Angeles Knight Riders by 8 wickets in Morrisville.

**First Innings:** Los Angeles Knight Riders were bowled out for 129 runs, thanks to a brilliant bowling performance by Washington Freedom. Saurabh Netravalkar took 4/35, Glenn Maxwell took 3/15, and Lockie Ferguson took 2 wickets.

**Key Performances:** Saif Badar top-scored for Knight Riders with 35 runs. Steve Smith took a remarkable catch off Glenn Maxwell's bowling to dismiss Nitish Kumar.

**Second Innings:** Washington Freedom chased down the target comfortably, with Travis Head scoring 54 off 32 balls and Steve Smith scoring an unbeaten 42. Freedom won with 8 wickets and 4 overs to spare.

**Tournament Update:** Washington Freedom extended their unbeaten run in MLC 2024, maintaining their perfect start to the season.

* The article reports on Steve Smith's return to competitive cricket with Washington Freedom in the ongoing MLC 2024.
* Smith, the former Australia captain, has been in good form with the bat and also took a stunning catch during a game against Los Angeles Knight Riders.
* The catch was off a delivery by Glenn Maxwell and helped Washington Freedom restrict the Knight Riders to 129 runs, which they eventually chased down with 8 wickets in hand.
* Washington Freedom won the game comfortably, with the Knight Riders struggling at 89 for 8 at one stage before the lower-order batsmen added some runs.

Overall, the article focuses on Steve Smith's impressive performance in the MLC, marking his return to competitive cricket after a long break.

* Match: TEX (Texas Super Kings) vs NY (MI New York)
* Date: Monday, 15th July 2024
* Venue: Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas

**Team Stats**

* Texas Super Kings: Faf du Plessis (c), Calvin Savage, Mohammad Mohsin, Devon Conway (wk), Aaron Hardie, etc.
* MI New York: Kieron Pollard (c), Nicholas Pooran (wk), Tim David, Ruben Clinton, Ehsan Adil, etc.

**Pitch Report**

* The pitch at Grand Prairie Stadium is balanced for both batting and bowling.
* Average score is 155 runs.
* Weather conditions will favor seamers.

**Weather Report**

* Partly cloudy with 13% chance of rain.
* Temperature expected to be 35°C and humidity 41%.

**Fantasy Cricket Tips**

* Nicholas Pooran and Rashid Khan are top picks for the match.
* Faf du Plessis and Aaron Hardie are good choices for captain and vice-captain.

This summary provides an overview of the upcoming match between Texas Super Kings and MI New York in the Major League Cricket tournament, including team stats, pitch and weather reports, and fantasy cricket tips.

**Match Preview:** Texas Super Kings will face MI New York on July 15, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, United States, in a crucial match that could determine their playoff advancement.

**Previous Encounter:** The two teams had a previous encounter this season, which ended in a draw due to rain.

**Team Performance:** MI New York has a stronger batting lineup and an experienced bowling attack, giving them a slight edge over Texas Super Kings. Texas Super Kings, led by Faf du Plessis, will need to leverage their spirited players to challenge MI New York.

**Recent Matches:** Texas Super Kings have had a mixed bag of performances, winning two of their last five matches, while MI New York has been in excellent form, winning all five of their recent matches.

**Head-to-Head Matches:** The recent head-to-head matches between Texas Super Kings and MI New York suggest a closely contested match ahead, with both teams having had their moments of dominance in previous encounters.

**Predicted Lineups:** The predicted playing XI for both teams provides a balanced view of their strategies and key players to watch.

**Key Points to Watch:** Injuries, team form, player form, weather conditions, pitch conditions, middle order performance, and experienced bowlers are all factors that could influence the outcome of the match.

**Prediction:** Based on the current form and odds, MI New York is likely to win this match. However, Texas Super Kings cannot be underestimated and have the capability to surprise their opponents.

**Betting Tips:** Factors such as pitch condition, weather and overhead conditions, team composition, head-to-head records, and innings progress are all important to consider when making predictions for the match.

**Match Preview**: Table-toppers Washington Freedom will face the Los Angeles Knight Riders in their fourth match of Major League Cricket 2024 at Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina, on July 14.

**Current Form**: Washington Freedom are unbeaten in MLC 2024, sitting at the top of the points table with five points from three games. They beat Seattle Orcas by five wickets in their last match, with Lockie Ferguson taking four wickets and Saurabh Netravalkar supporting with three wickets.

**Head-to-Head**: Washington Freedom have won two of their last five matches in the MLC, including a six-wicket win against LAKR in MLC 2023.

**Players to Watch**: Lockie Ferguson, Saurabh Netravalkar, Lahiru Milantha, and Obus Pienaar are expected to perform well in the upcoming match.

**Match Details**: The match will start at 3:30 PM ET (July 15, 1:00 AM IST) and will be available for live streaming and broadcast on Monumental Sports Network, Willow by Cricbuzz (USA), and Jio Cinema App and website (India).

**Washington Freedom Squad**: The team's squad includes Steven Smith (c), Akhilesh Reddy, Jack Edwards, Andries Gous, Travis Head, Lahiru Milantha, Mukhtar Ahmed, Justin Dill, Ian Holland, Marco Jansen, Glenn Maxwell, Obus Pienaar, Rachin Ravindra, Amila Aponso, Lockie Ferguson, Akeal Hosein, Saurabh Netravalkar, Andrew Tye, and Yasir Mohammad.

* NBC Sports Bay Area and NBC Sports California have partnered with Willow by Cricbuzz to broadcast five live San Francisco Unicorns MLC matches starting July 10.
* The matches will be televised to fans in Northern California, catering to the growing interest in cricket in the region.
* The Unicorns' MLC matches will be part of the networks' diverse sports programming, which already includes over 600 live events annually.
* The five MLC matches to be broadcast on NBC Sports Bay Area and NBC Sports California are:
	+ July 10: Unicorns vs. Texas Super Kings at 12 PM PT
	+ July 13: Los Angeles vs. Unicorns at 12 PM PT
	+ July 15: Orcas vs. Unicorns at 12 PM PT
	+ July 18: MI New York vs. Unicorns at 5:30 PM PT
	+ July 20: Unicorns vs. Orcas at 5:30 PM PT
* Willow by Cricbuzz will distribute all MLC matches this season on TV and its dedicated streaming app.
